result.errata_reason: This errata version of the assessment has been published to correct a typo in the (Brown, 1994) reference, and to remove a reference which was erroneously duplicated.
result.amended_reason: Point locality records for this species were recently compiled by D. Van Damme. As a result of these records, there has been a slight extension to the previously published distribution range for this species. These point locality records are also now displayed on the distribution map.
